summary: The implementation comprehensively addresses all 11 requirements for the admin approval system. Backend data models, registration modifications, admin functions, frontend dashboard, filtering logic, profile status indicators, header navigation, and admin authorization checks are all present with evidence in the diff.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin token URL parameter handling with sessionStorage persistence
hallucinated_features.reason: The implementation includes a URL parameter system for 'caffeineAdminToken' with session storage management (urlParams.ts utility and useActor.ts integration). This admin token mechanism was not requested in any requirement.

hallucinated_features.description: User profile management system with name and email fields
hallucinated_features.reason: Backend includes UserProfile type with saveCallerUserProfile and getCallerUserProfile functions. Frontend has corresponding hooks in useQueries.ts. User profile management was not part of the BuildRequest requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Modal dialog for rejection reason input
hallucinated_features.reason: AdminDashboardPage includes a Dialog component with Textarea for rejection reasons. While REQ-5 and REQ-6 mention ability to set rejection reason, the specific implementation as a modal prompt goes beyond the minimal requirement statement.
